briefTitle: ESP Block VS TAP in Laparoscopic Hysterectomy
officialTitle: Erector Spinae Plane Block Versus Transverse Abdominis Plane Block in Laparoscopic Hysterectomy
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the difference between two different pain control methods in patients who will be having a hysterectomy surgery. By collecting this data, we aim to show improved postoperative pain scores, decreased opioid needs, and decreased opioid side effects (nausea, sedation, ileus, urinary retention, respiratory depression).

primaryOutcome.measure: Visual Analogue Scale (VAS) Pain Scores at Rest at 1 Hour.
